## asciiTree() function

Generates an ASCII string representation of a tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function asciiTree(tree: TreeNode[]): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tree | [TreeNode](./markdown-magic-utils.treenode.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The tree to transform in ASCII. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

The generated string representation of the tree.
